review.title: “Great First Experience”
review.pros: Pros – Relaxed ,but professional at all times. Open to new ideas and feedback on projects, a great place to get your experience in the industry.
review.cons: Cons – Limited opportunity for advancement .Long hours for first year associates .Sometimes managementloses focus of employees needs and fails to follow through with promises.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep empolyees invoved in decision making.
